name: Pyre of Vigil
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 43

LD page:https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/pyre-of-vigil

Theme is Sacrifices must be made

So I made a card game that you need to burn cards for energy and enemy attack your deck

Drag cards left to use them, drag them right to burn.

If fire or soul(which is your deck) reaches 0 the game is over.
